bomberman.game.activeelements

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • bomberman.game.elements.GameElement
      • bomberman.game.activeelements.ActiveElement
        • bomberman.game.activeelements.Player

  • public class Player
extends ActiveElement
    Class used to instantiate a player only in a singleplayer game.
    Author:
    thebomberman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor to instantiate a player from a saved game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(Map map,
              Game game,
              Keyboard input)
        Constructor to instantiate a player in a new game.
        Parameters:
        map - Corresponding map.
        game - Corresponding game.
        input - Commands are given by this object.

      • Player

        public Player(Map map,
              Game game,
              Keyboard input,
              java.lang.String player,
              int score)
        Constructor to instantiate a player from a saved game.
        Parameters:
        map - Corresponding map.
        game - Corresponding game.
        input - Object that commands player actions.
        player - Formated String with saved player parameters. Split by commas.
        score - Score from saved game.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Method to update the gamer state, like the position and the corresponding movement sprite. This method makes player react to the given keyboard input.
        Specified by:
        update in class GameElement

      • render

        public void render(Screen screen)
        Method to render player to the given screen. It is checked if player is over a powerup or exit.
        Specified by:
        render in class ActiveElement
        Parameters:
        screen - Where to render element.

      • move

        public void move(int xa,
                 int ya)
        Move the player according to the given absolute coordinates.
        Parameters:
        xa - absolute X coordinate.
        ya - absolute Y coordinate.

      • die

        public void die()
        Method to kill player. Can only die once.
